alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 1:53PM PST until February 26 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SATURDAY TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Accumulations between 8 and 12 inches for Stevens Pass and higher terrain. Accumulations of 2 to 4 inches for elevations below 4000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Stehekin, Holden Village, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...From 10 PM Saturday to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
